name: Gunai Rumble
description:
You and your Slime Ninja's have been terrorized by the Rabbit Ronins, and they stole your dojo's prized possessions. Traverse through a city or forest level while dodging carrot cannons and carrot pools. Bring honor to your dojo.

It's recommended to play using an Xbox Controller when downloaded.

This is a prototype of several new ideas it will most likely not see the light of day as a full game.
